00010 // An abstract functor. Takes in the track set, and fills the 
00011 // initial reconstruction. Returns true if it was successful, 
00012 // false otherwise.
00013 class bundler_sfm_create_initial_recon
00014 {
00015  public:
00016   virtual bool operator() (
00017       bundler_inters_reconstruction &reconstruction) = 0;
00018 };
00019 
00020 
00021 //:
00022 // Takes in the current reconstruction and the image set, and selects the
00023 // next images to be added to the reconstruction.
00024 class bundler_sfm_select_next_images
00025 {
00026  public:
00027   //: Takes in reconstruction and track_set, fills to_add as a return val.
00028   // Returns true if at least one image was found that fits whatever the
00029   // criteria for a good next image is. If this returns false, the 
00030   // reconstruction should be considered to be complete.
00031   virtual bool operator() (
00032       bundler_inters_reconstruction &reconstruction,
00033 
00034       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &to_add) = 0;
00035 };
00036 
00037 
00038 //:
00039 // Takes in the current reconstruction and an image, and adds the image to
00040 // the reconstruction. This calculates the pose of the images' camera.
00041 // added_cameras is filled with references to the created cameras, for 
00042 // the next stage.
00043 class bundler_sfm_add_next_images
00044 {
00045  public:
00046   virtual void operator() (
00047       const vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &to_add,
00048 
00049       bundler_inters_reconstruction &reconstruction,
00050       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &added_images) = 0;
00051 };
00052 
00053 
00054 //:
00055 // Adds points to the reconstruction using the new cameras calculated in the
00056 // add_next_images stage. to_add are the cameras that were added in the 
00057 // previous stage.
00058 class bundler_sfm_add_new_points
00059 {
00060  public:
00061   virtual void operator() (
00062       bundler_inters_reconstruction &reconstruction,
00063       const vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &added) = 0;
00064 };

00069 class bundler_sfm_bundle_adjust

00071  public:
00072   virtual void operator() (
00073       bundler_inters_reconstruction &reconstruction) = 0;
